fields.name: AdministratorLogin
fields.description: The administrator's login name of servers in server group. Can only be specified when the server is being created (and is required for creation).

fields.name: AdministratorLoginPassword
fields.description: The password of the administrator login.

fields.name: AvailabilityZone
fields.description: Availability Zone information of the server group.

fields.name: BackupRetentionDays
fields.description: The backup retention days for server group.

fields.name: CitusVersion
fields.description: The Citus version of server group.

fields.name: CreateMode
fields.description: The mode to create a new server group.

fields.name: DelegatedSubnetArguments
fields.description: The delegated subnet arguments for a server group.

fields.name: EarliestRestoreTime
fields.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for server group.

fields.name: EnableMx
fields.description: If Citus MX is enabled or not for the server group.

fields.name: EnableShardsOnCoordinator
fields.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the server group.

fields.name: EnableZfs
fields.description: If ZFS compression is enabled or not for the server group.

fields.name: MaintenanceWindow
fields.description: Maintenance window of a server group.

fields.name: PointInTimeUTC
fields.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from. It's required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore'

fields.name: PostgresqlVersion
fields.description: The PostgreSQL version of server group.

fields.name: PrivateDnsZoneArguments
fields.description: The private dns zone arguments for a server group.

fields.name: ReadReplicas
fields.description: The array of read replica server groups.

fields.name: ResourceProviderType
fields.description: The resource provider type of server group.

fields.name: ServerRoleGroups
fields.description: The list of server role groups.

fields.name: SourceLocation
fields.description: The source server group location to restore from. It's required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica'

fields.name: SourceResourceGroupName
fields.description: The source resource group name to restore from. It's required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica'

fields.name: SourceServerGroup
fields.description: The source server group id for read replica server groups.

fields.name: SourceServerGroupName
fields.description: The source server group name to restore from. It's required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica'

fields.name: SourceSubscriptionId
fields.description: The source subscription id to restore from. It's required when 'createMode' is 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica'

fields.name: StandbyAvailabilityZone
fields.description: Standby Availability Zone information of the server group.

fields.name: State
fields.description: A state of a server group that is visible to user.
